name: react-canvas-map
description: An interactive canvas-based map component for React.
author: Michael Boreham

scripts.publish:demo: git branch -D gh-pages; git push origin --delete gh-pages; git checkout -b gh-pages && cd demo && npm install && cd .. && git add . && git add -f demo/dist && git add -f demo/node_modules/uptick-demo-site/dist && git commit -m "Demo site build" && git push origin gh-pages && git checkout master && git push origin `git subtree split --prefix demo gh-pages`:gh-pages --force
scripts.prepare: npm run build && npm run generate-types
